lstDialogOne: Our kind is very pleased with your decision to revoke your policy on illegal mind altering powders!
Your open mindedness and tolerance to our kinds culture and way of life is most pleasing!
As a token of our new found friendship..
Of course our kind expects to see a continuation of this trend, no less..
lstDialogTwo: Your refusal to respect our peoples traditions on mind altering drugs has outraged our kinds leaders! |p2
Be warned, our armies stand ready to enforce the rights of our people in your lands
We have reports on your military, and know you have little.
